8100.name: Destroyed Golem Shards
8100.description: Shards obtained from hunting the Golem.

8101.name: Dwarf's Favor
8101.description: Letter of introduction to Yumita, written by Head Blacksmith Newyear of Schuttgart Village.

8102.name: Pa'agrian Sword - Focus
8102.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical Rate by 77. Special Ability: Focus

8103.name: Pa'agrian Sword - Health
8103.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Special Ability: Health

8104.name: Pa'agrian Sword - Critical Drain
8104.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Absorbs 9 HP from a target when one makes a critical attack.

8105.name: Guardian Sword - Critical Drain
8105.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Absorbs 8 HP from a target on a critical attack.

8106.name: Guardian Sword - Health
8106.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Special Ability: Health

8107.name: Guardian Sword - Critical Bleed
8107.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Inflicts Bleed on the target with a 24% chance during a general critical attack.

8108.name: Infernal Master - Haste
8108.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 6%. Increases damage inflicted on one's opponent during PvP. Special Ability: Haste

8109.name: Infernal Master - Critical Damage
8109.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Inflicts additional damage on a critical attack by 297. Increases damage inflicted on one's opponent during PvP. Special Ability: Critical Damage

8110.name: Infernal Master - Focus
8110.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical Rate by 61. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Focus

8111.name: Mysterious Sword - Acumen
8111.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Casting Spd. by 15%. Special Ability: Acumen

8112.name: Mysterious Sword - M. Atk.
8112.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. When using magic, increases MP Consumption by 15% and M. Atk. by 75. Special Ability: M. Atk.

8113.name: Mysterious Sword - Magic Weakness
8113.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 8% chance of casting Curse: Weakness when using a magic skill on the target.

8114.name: Ecliptic Sword - Empower
8114.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases M. Atk. by 26. Special Ability: Empower

8115.name: Ecliptic Sword - M. Atk.
8115.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. When using magic, increases MP Consumption by 15% and M. Atk. by 112. Special Ability: M. Atk.

8116.name: Ecliptic Sword - Magic Silence
8116.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 10% chance of casting Silence when using a magic skill on the target.

8117.name: Wizard's Tear - Acumen
8117.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Casting Spd. by 15%. Special Ability: Acumen

8118.name: Wizard's Tear - M. Atk.
8118.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. When using magic, increases MP Consumption by 15% and M. Atk. by 139. Special Ability: M. Atk.

8119.name: Wizard's Tear - Conversion
8119.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 60% and decreases Max HP by 40%. Special Ability: Conversion

8120.name: Dwarven Hammer - Health
8120.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Special Ability: Health

8121.name: Dwarven Hammer - Anger
8121.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Decreases Max HP by 15% and increases P. Atk. by 26. Special Ability: Anger

8122.name: Dwarven Hammer - Critical Bleed
8122.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Inflicts Bleed on the target with a 42% chance during a general critical attack.

8123.name: Karik Horn - Focus
8123.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical Rate by 77. Special Ability: Focus

8124.name: Karik Horn - Haste
8124.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 7%. Special Ability: Haste

8125.name: Karik Horn - Critical Drain
8125.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Absorbs 9 HP from a target when one makes a critical attack.

8126.name: Destroyer Hammer - Health
8126.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted on one's opponent during PvP. Special Ability: Health

8127.name: Destroyer Hammer - Haste
8127.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Sp.d by 6%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Haste

8128.name: Destroyer Hammer - Critical Drain
8128.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Absorbs 18 HP from a target on a critical attack. Increases the amount of damage one inflicts during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

8129.name: Ice Storm Hammer - Focus
8129.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical Rate by 68. Special Ability: Focus

8130.name: Ice Storm Hammer - Anger
8130.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Decreases Max HP 15% and increases P. Atk. by 28. Special Ability: Anger

8131.name: Ice Storm Hammer - Critical Bleed
8131.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Inflicts Bleed on the target with a 41% chance during a general critical attack.

8132.name: Star Buster - Health
8132.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Special Ability: Health

8133.name: Star Buster - Haste
8133.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by about 6%. Special Ability: Haste

8134.name: Star Buster - Rsk. Focus
8134.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Critical Rate by 99 when the character's HP falls to 60% or below. Special Ability: Rsk. Focus

8135.name: Doom Crusher - Health
8135.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max HP by 25%. Increases damage inflicted on one's opponent during PvP. Special Ability: Health

8136.name: Doom Crusher - Anger
8136.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Decreases Max HP by 15% and increases P. Atk. by 11% and damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: Anger

8137.name: Doom Crusher - Rsk. Haste
8137.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Atk. Spd. by 11% when HP drops to 60% or lower. Increases damage inflicted on one's opponent during PvP. Special Ability: Rsk. Haste

8138.name: Ecliptic Axe - Conversion
8138.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 60% and decreases Max HP by 40%. Special Ability: Conversion

8139.name: Ecliptic Axe - M. Atk.
8139.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. When using magic, increases MP Consumption by 15%, and M. Atk. by 112. Special Ability: M. Atk.

8140.name: Ecliptic Axe - Magic Hold
8140.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 10% chance of casting Dryad Root when using a magic skill on the target.

8141.name: Spell Breaker - Acumen
8141.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Casting Spd. by 15%. Special Ability: Acumen

8142.name: Spell Breaker - Mental Shield
8142.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 50% chance of casting Mental Shield when using a magic skill on the target.

8143.name: Spell Breaker - Magic Hold
8143.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 10% chance of casting Dryad Root when using a magic skill on the target.

8144.name: Kaim Vanul's Bones - Mana Up
8144.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 30%. Special Ability: Mana Up

8145.name: Kaim Vanul's Bones - Magic Silence
8145.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 10% chance of casting Silence when using a magic skill on the target.

8146.name: Kaim Vanul's Bones - Conversion
8146.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 60% and decreases Max HP by 40%. Special Ability: Conversion

8147.name: Spiritual Eye - Mana Up
8147.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Max MP by 30%. Increases damage inflicted on one's opponent during PvP. Special Ability: Mana Up

8148.name: Spiritual Eye - Magic Poison
8148.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 8% chance of casting Curse: Poison when using a magic skill on the target. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

8149.name: Spiritual Eye - Acumen
8149.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Casting Spd. by 15%. Increases damage inflicted on one's opponent during PvP. Special Ability: Acumen

8150.name: Flaming Dragon Skull - Acumen
8150.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases Casting Spd. by 15%. Increases damage inflicted on one's opponent during PvP. Special Ability: Acumen

8151.name: Flaming Dragon Skull - M. Atk.
8151.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Increases MP Consumption by 15%, M. Atk. by 167 and damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: M. Atk.

8152.name: Flaming Dragon Skull - Magic Silence
8152.description: <Soul Crystal Enhancement>. Has a 10% chance of casting Silence when using a magic skill on the target. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Special Ability: PvP Damage

8154.name: Herb of Life
8154.description: Recovers a certain amount of HP immediately. Herb of Life

8155.name: Herb of Mana
8155.description: Recovers a certain amount of MP immediately. Herb of Mana

8156.name: Herb of Power
8156.description: Increases P. Atk. for a certain period of time. Herb of Power

8157.name: Herb of Magic
8157.description: Instantly increases M. Atk. for a certain period of time. Herb of Magic

8158.name: Memento Mori (C-Grade)
8158.description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss. You can assemble this Life Crystal and trade it for something useful.

8159.name: Memento Mori (B-Grade)
8159.description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss. You can assemble this Life Crystal and trade it for something useful.

8174.description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss. You can assemble this Life Crystal and trade it for something useful.

8175.name: Cradle of Creation
8175.description: Win this item by gambling and exchange it for an A-Grade item.

8176.name: Destruction Tombstone
8176.description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss. You can assemble this Life Crystal and trade it for something useful.

8180.name: Circlet of Ice Fairy Sirra
8180.description: Circlet obtained by attacking the Ice Fairy Sirra.

8181.name: Academy Circlet
8181.description: Circlet awarded to graduates of the Academy. When equipped by a level 40~75 character, upon death, the Exp. penalty decreases by 50%. Can be repurchased through Blacksmith Pinter of Gludio.

8182.name: Circlet of Rune
8182.description: Rose Circlet. Can be worn by the lord of Rune Castle and clan members but not by allies. Allows use of Residential Skills when equipped. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Residential Shock Immunity

8183.name: Circlet of Schuttgart
8183.description: Hammer and Torch Circlet. Can be worn by the lord of Schuttgart Castle and clan members but not by allies. Allows use of Residential Skills when equipped. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Residential Shock Immunity

8184.name: Party Hat
8184.description: A funky hair accessory which uses 2 hair accessory slots.

8185.name: Feathered Hat
8185.description: A wide-brimmed hat with a feather. Uses 2 accessory slots.

8186.name: Artisan's Goggles
8186.description: Eye protection that uses 2 accessory slots.

8187.name: Demon Horns
8187.description: A hair accessory for the 2006 Halloween Event.

8189.name: Fairy Antennae
8189.description: Cute antennae hair accessory with stars.

8190.name: Demonic Sword Zariche
8190.description: A deadly and powerful magical sword that was once wielded by the devil Bremnon himself. It is always thirsty for blood. Demon Sword Zariche

8191.name: Necklace of Frintezza
8191.description: MP +42, increase Resistance to sleep/paralysis/stun by 15%, increase sleep/paralysis/stun attack chance by 15%, increase Resistance to poison/bleed by 25%, increase poison/bleed attack chance by 25%, decrease in skill re-use delay, increase Damage Shield effect, and increase Resistance to Dark attacks. Frintezza's Necklace

8192.name: Soul Breaking Arrow
8192.description: Double-clicking the arrow temporarily pauses Frintezza's musical performance. It cannot be dropped and is deleted upon entering the Last Imperial Tomb. <set name="enchant_enabled" val="true" />NOTE: Retail typo. Soul Breaking Arrow

8193.name: Fisherman's Potion - Green
8193.description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a green fish (level 1~3 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect. Fisherman's Potion Green

8194.name: Fisherman's Potion - Jade
8194.description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a jade fish (level 4~6 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect. Fisherman's Potion Green

8195.name: Fisherman's Potion - Blue
8195.description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a blue fish (level 7~9 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect. Fisherman's Potion Green

8196.name: Fisherman's Potion - Yellow
8196.description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a yellow fish (level 10~12 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect. Fisherman's Potion Green

8197.name: Fisherman's Potion - Orange
8197.description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch an orange fish (level 13~15 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect. Fisherman's Potion Green

8198.name: Fisherman's Potion - Purple
8198.description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a purple fish (level 16~18 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect. Fisherman's Potion Green

8199.name: Fisherman's Potion - Red
8199.description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a red fish (level 19~21 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect. Fisherman's Potion Green
